data.actual_result: they're too light, not gone but super light
data.expected_result: the header is dark when you use light theme
data.short_description: User role management header is too light on light theme.
data.steps_to_repro: - have light theme and Discord ver. 716 - go into server settings then user management and into role management - notice the in app back button, screen name, etc are super light to almost a point of being unable to see them
